creator: Blue Wizard Digital Inc
descriptionHtml:
"They thought camp would be fun. But it wasn't. Because they're dead."

From the makers of Slayaway Camp & Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle comes an endless runner / slasher extravaganza: Slashy Camp!

Hunt down your camper victims and rack up a monster score while playing as SkullFace, the masked 1980s horror movie slasher hell-bent on revenge. Gain XP for each murderlicious run and unlock new iconic slashers, crazy new weapons and goretastic mini-games.

Gameplay Features
• A fun, casual, endless runner slaughterfest! Swipe in any direction and move SkullFace one square at a time to hunt down campers and rack up kills.
• Tons of traps! Avoid the campfires, bottomless lakes, spike traps, and landmines—or, scare the campers into them for ultimate bonus points!
• Level Up! Gain XP and reach new levels to unlock awesome new slasher movie icons like the Wolfman, Vampire, Slime Monster, and Fishman.
• Weapons Galore! Collect tons of murderlicious weaponry from the Chainsaw to the Golden Machete to the Tuna Fish. Once unlocked, each weapon can be found on a run and used to eviscerate campers in a mini-game for ultimate bonus points!
• Discover new strategies and puzzle out the best ways to disembowel your victims for maximum points.
descriptionShort: An goretastic endless slasher from the makers of Slayaway Camp!
title: Slashy Camp

creator: Blue Wizard Digital Inc
descriptionHtml:
"They thought camp would be fun. But it wasn't. Because they're dead."

From the makers of Slayaway Camp & Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle comes an endless runner / slasher extravaganza: Slashy Camp!

Hunt down your camper victims and rack up a monster score while playing as SkullFace, the masked 1980s horror movie slasher hell-bent on revenge. Gain XP for each murderlicious run and unlock new iconic slashers, crazy new weapons and goretastic mini-games.

Gameplay Features
• A fun, casual, endless runner slaughterfest! Swipe in any direction and move SkullFace one square at a time to hunt down campers and rack up kills.
• Tons of traps! Avoid the campfires, bottomless lakes, spike traps, and landmines—or, scare the campers into them for ultimate bonus points!
• Level Up! Gain XP and reach new levels to unlock awesome new slasher movie icons like the Wolfman, Vampire, Slime Monster, and Fishman.
• Weapons Galore! Collect tons of murderlicious weaponry from the Chainsaw to the Golden Machete to the Tuna Fish. Once unlocked, each weapon can be found on a run and used to eviscerate campers in a mini-game for ultimate bonus points!
• Use your noodle to discover new strategies and puzzle out the best ways to disembowel your victims for maximum points... or just shut off your brain entirely and smash through everything that bleeds like a wild homicidal beast.
descriptionShort: An goretastic endless slasher from the makers of Slayaway Camp!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New victim designs! Congrats to our Victimization Contest Winners! Now go kill 'em!
- Tweaked Tap vs. Swipe distances for a bit better control.
- Tweaked the difficulty on some of the obstacles.
- Moving volume sliders to 0 should now give you perfect silence, and not let a little tiny bit of volume squeeze through.
- Improvements to beast mode performance, for more beastlier beast mode.
- Some more really very ultra super minor bug fixes and optimizations.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- 4 iconic new slashers available to unlock!
- 23 deadly new bonus weapons to discover!
- Special 'Bonus Ghosts' that can double your XP for a round when caught!
- Awesomely hot and spicy bug fixes and optimizations!

Hunt down your camper victims and rack up a monster score while playing as SkullFace, the masked 1980s horror movie slasher hell-bent on revenge. Gain XP for each murderlicious run and unlock new iconic slashers, crazy new weapons and goretastic mini-games. It's endless slashing in this goretastic free infinite runner game!

Gameplay Features
• A fun, casual, endless runner slaughterfest horror game! Swipe in any direction and move SkullFace one square at a time to hunt down campers and rack up kills.
• Tons of traps! Avoid the campfires, bottomless lakes, spike traps, and landmines—or, scare the campers into them for ultimate bonus points!

• Use your noodle to discover new strategies and puzzle out the best ways to disembowel your victims for maximum points... or just shut off your brain entirely and smash through everything that bleeds like a wild homicidal beast.
• Free to Play, no need to pay anything to play this endless runner horror game!
